title: Did 41 senators "scream until they were born alive"?
subtitle: The United States Senate Bill raised 311 widely shared social media articles targeting the Democratic and Independent Senators in 2020.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In 2019 and 2020, democracy and independence in the United States. Members of the Senate voted to allow health-care practitioners to let children die, without treatment, if they were born alive after abortion.
